name: IT Solution Architecture / Engineer-ICT architecture
description:
The position is responsible for the architecture, engineering and construction of civil work in DC facility project:

  • Consultant for DC/IT integration service (DC L0, L1 engineering service)
  • Design the cost effective solution for whole system, including Power, Cooling etc;
  • Preparation of activities for promotion of solutions and services, including presentations;
  • Carrying out of negotiations (the organization of meetings with the potential client and creation of a favorable emotional background of business dialogue);
  • Interaction with internal services of the company;
  • Business development; Support the business Promotion;
  • Control over the fulfillment of the purchase order, shipment, etc.;

Requirements:

  • High education;
  • Uptime Certificate - ATD, ATS (as advantage)
  • Spoken and Written English;
  • Experience at same position (Presale engineer)<5Y
  • Experience in participation of construction of DC <1MW from presale stage till Legalization
  • Support of sales of service for power system
  • Knowledge of Russian and International requirements in DC;
  • Ability to design high level solution of DC
  • Knowledge of main manufactures of Power, cooling, ELV equipment
  • Know market and main competitors

Conditions:

  • Official employment in the staff of the partner company*.
  • Mobile payment;
  • Cozy office in BC Krylatsky hills;
  • Friendly team;
  • Work experience in an international company;
  • Discount on company products.

*Term employment contract with recruitment agency.
